item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: The Letter # It was the usual sunny day in London. The streets were filled with people and the shops were out of clothes, food, furniture etc. Nearby, a small house was covered with thornes and ivy looked like it was abandoned .beside the abandoned house was a place almost like a mansion just a bit smaller it was all white and had a beautiful garden in the middle of the garden was a statue of a little boy with a crown on his head.
